name: Kaua’i Electric
description: Kaua’i Electric is a Hawaiian landrace sativa that has been cultivated on the Powerline trail near Mt. Wai’ale’ale, also known as the rainiest place on Earth. This hearty sativa exhibits a range of bright tropical colors and smells of passionfruit and guava. The flavors are fresh and tropical with an aftertaste of skunk and earth. Kaua’i Electric has a carefree cerebral energy while leaving the body light and blissful.
attributes_title: Creative, Energetic, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
